name: Homer's Homicide
description:
~Story~

After Krusty Burger is shut down, Homer grows disgruntled and mentally unstable. He begins slaughtering the members of the Simpson family one by one. Bart sees an opportunity to escape when Homer - tired from the strenuous activity of murder - falls asleep on the couch.

~About~

Homer's Homicide is a walking exploration, and stealth horror game created by Double Vision Studios.  

~Warning~

We do NOT own any rights to Homer Simpson and this is NOT an official Simpsons product. This is a FAN game.

This game contains scary and disturbing content, as well as jumpscares.

~Credits~

Homer - SorroW

Maggie Simpson - Melco007

Lisa Simpson (cool) animated - Vicente Betoret Ferrero

Marge Simpson - Placidone

Wooden Baby Crib - LincolnLabs

Crib - mylesven
